solution_line_template: To meet Dr. Juan's recommendation would mean drinking {total_milk_gallons}/{total_days} = <<{total_milk_gallons}/{total_days}={required_daily_milk}>>{required_daily_milk} gallons daily.

This means that Flora must drink {required_daily_milk} -{flora_daily_milk} = <<{required_daily_milk}-{flora_daily_milk}={additional_daily_milk_needed}>>{additional_daily_milk_needed} more gallons daily.
